attributes.action: Make all clothing and footwear unisex so crossdressers can shop freely
attributes.additional_details: So more crossdressers like myself and transgender people don’t have to hide who they are for 6 or more years due to fear of being humiliated ridiculed and kicked out the store for wanting to buy a dress
attributes.background: Degenderise clothing so all clothing are made for both men and women eg dresses in men’s sizes and fits so crossdressers and transgender people can safely go into a store and buy a dress without fear of being rejected and ridiculed

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for clothing retailers.
